data.name: NERF Legends - Elite Blaster Combo Pack
data.detailed_description: Expand your arsenal with two powerful blasters - the NERF Elite Triad and the NERF Elite Strongarm. Additionally, this pack comes with a color-shifting iridescent skin and four unique blaster effects which can be applied to any blaster in the game, and you can load out with these in both single player and multiplayer modes.  Upon downloading these items, they will be available from the customization menu.
data.about_the_game: Expand your arsenal with two powerful blasters - the NERF Elite Triad and the NERF Elite Strongarm. Additionally, this pack comes with a color-shifting iridescent skin and four unique blaster effects which can be applied to any blaster in the game, and you can load out with these in both single player and multiplayer modes.  Upon downloading these items, they will be available from the customization menu.
data.short_description: Expand your arsenal with two powerful blasters - the NERF Elite Triad and the NERF Elite Strongarm plus an iridescent skin and four unique blaster effects that can be applied to any blaster.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows
  • Processor: Core i5 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Core i7 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
